entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
